contributes.commands0.title: git add: File in Active Editor
contributes.commands1.title: git add: -u (Changes in Tracked Files)
contributes.commands2.title: git add: Selected Lines or Cursor Line
config.git-add-with-git-add.showExplorer: Display command in Explorer context menu
config.git-add-with-git-add.dialogOnWork: VSCode treats commands triggered from the Explorer's empty area as targeting the entire workspace folder, ignoring the visually selected file. Enable this setting to show a warning dialog for such actions. Default is ON.
config.git-add-with-git-add.dialogOnExec: Display a warning dialog when executing git restore
config.git-add-with-git-add.showFileStat: Display the file status in the status bar each time the active editor changes.
config.git-add-with-git-add.fileStatusFo:
File status display format.

**Available placeholders:**

- `${abs_path}`: Absolute file path

- `${rel_path}`: Relative path from the workspace folder

- `${file}`: File name

- `${git_stat}`: Long style status notation such as `Added`, `Modified`, `Modified+Added`

- `${git_short_stat}`: Short style status notation such as `A`, `M`, `M+A`
config.git-add-with-git-add.fileStatusPr: Priority of the display order when shown as a status bar item
config.title.file-status-bar: Show File Status in Status Bar
git-add-with-git-add.showFileStatusInSta: Always display as a status bar item
